snippet.title: Bolo Apple 2
snippet.description: I consider Bolo one of the best games ever on any platform. Genius programming including fast animation / scrolling and excellent AI. My actions in this video are limited to acceleration, deceleration, turning left and right, and shooting. Additional actions are possible including rotating your gun and an emergency stop.
